release.description: This release of the Registry User Interface is a component of the integrated release 4.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of the Registry User Interface is a component of the integrated release 3.1.1 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Added a refresh button on the Package tab.

release.description: This release of the Registry User Interface is a component of the integrated release 3.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Modify the Products.java class to reload a page after returning zero results from a previous search call.

release.description: This release of the Registry User Interface is a component of the integrated release 3.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Updated the supported data object type list based on the v03 information model.

release.description: This release of the Registry User Interface is a component of the integrated release 2.2.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Provide the capability to update the status of product(s)/package(s).
Provide the capability to delete the product(s)/package(s).
Provide the capability to show the records with different numbers on the products, associations, events, and classification nodes tabs.
Provide the capability to copy and paste with ctrl-c/ctrl-v keys on popup windows.
Fixed incorrect sorting with the eventType field on the events tab.
Fixed incorrect filtering with a requestId on the events tab.
Removed the parent project's Release Notes document. This document now serves as the single source for this component's release changes.

release.description: This release of the Registry User Interface is a component of the integrated release 2.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Cleaned up the documentation and removed the PDF generation feature.

release.description: This release of the Registry User Interface is a component of the integrated release 2.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Provide the capability to browse associations, packages, services, events, schemes, and classification nodes contained in the registry.
Disabled autohide feature of popup windows.
Modify the height of data-table with fixed size to remove the scrollbar within data table region.

release.description: This release of the Registry User Interface is a component of the integrated release 1.2.0 of the PDS4 System. This release is intended as a prototype release in support of the assessment of the PDS4 standards and the system components to date.
release.action: Modify the interface with the Registry Service to conform with changes made in version 0.7.0.
Update the contents of the Object Type pull-down menu to conform with the supported types from the data model.

release.description: This release of the Registry User Interface is a component of the integrated release 1.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This release is intended as a prototype release in support of the assessment of the PDS4 standards and the system components to date.
release.action: Modify the interface with the Registry Service to conform with changes made in version 0.6.0.
Update the contents of the Object Type pull-down menu to conform with the supported types from the data model.

release.description: This release of the Registry User Interface is a component of the integrated release 1.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This release is intended as a prototype release in support of the assessment of the PDS4 standards.
release.action: Modify the interface with the Registry Service to conform with changes made in version 0.5.0.
Update the contents of the Object Type pull-down menu to conform with the supported types from the data model.

release.description: This release of the Registry User Interface is a component of the integrated release 0.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This release is intended as a prototype release in support of the demonstration at the Management Council Face-to-Face meeting in August 2010.
release.action: Provide the capability to access a target Registry Service via the REST-based interface.
Provide the capability to browse products contained in the registry.
Provide the capability to browse associations contained in the registry.
Provide the capability to filter result content based on the attributes contained in the registry for a product (e.g., Name, LID, etc.).
Provide the capability to sort result content based on the attributes contained in the registry for a product.
Provide the initial documentation covering the installation and operation of the software.
